text.section: The State Advisory Board shall meet regularly at least six times a year on the call of its chair.

A member of the State Advisory Board:
may not receive compensation as a member of the State Advisory Board; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

A member of the State Advisory Board may not have a direct or indirect interest in any contract for building, repairing, equipping, or providing materials or supplies to the Department or have any other financial interest in a contract with the Department.
